Package games.stendhal.client.sound.sound

Class ExtendedSoundManager

java.lang.Object
games.stendhal.client.sound.manager.SoundManagerNG
games.stendhal.client.sound.sound.ExtendedSoundManager
public class ExtendedSoundManager extends SoundManagerNG
this class is the main interface between the game logic and the low level sound system. It is a refinement of the manager.SoundManager class.
Author:
hendrik, silvio
